title: Bug 109718: The tooltip for a text item shows the content in one line instead of the expected format
description: When a large content is placed in a text item, the tooltip for the text item should show the content in a given format. However, it currently shows the content in one line.
OB: When placing mouse cursor on a text item with large content, the tooltip displays the content in one line.
EB: The tooltip for the text item should display the content in the expected format.
SR:
1. Create a text item with a large content.
2. Hover the mouse cursor over the text item.
3. Observe the tooltip and note that it displays the content in one line instead of the expected format.
